show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, interviews co-host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG. <!--more--> ,a leader in the field of Rheumatology and Immune System Function.
Together, they authored the best selling book ARTHRITIS, THE ALTERNATIVE MEDiCINE GUIDE.
and formulated powerful herbal remedies in The ARTHRO-WELLNESS KIT.
The Kit includes PhytoDyne Px and Amphyteric Px.
These formulas are designed to work synergistically to support healthy cartilage integrity, optimize cartilage matrix composition and support the maintenance and natural repair processes of connective tissue.
When taken together they provide optimal support for maintaining healthy cytokine balance and leukotriene and prostaglandin metabolism.
On todayâ€™s show, Dr Zampieron discusses the individual herbs in these formulations, such as Hops, Sarsaparilla, Rehmannia,Corydalis, Jamaican Dogwood, and more.
He will review the science involved with their mechanisms of action in terms of how they help individuals who are challenged by inflammation and pain.
Contact: www.drznaturally.com www.naturalnurse.com
